p: Although counts of pacing events were slightly higher for exploring enrichment (0.18 ± 0.11 events per 20 min) compared to foraging (0.11 ± 0.07 events per 20 min), the count of pacing events was not significantly predicted by the stated enrichment goal (F1,13 = 0.02, p = 0.897) or the total time spent on enrichment events (F1,221 = 0.89, p = 0.345).
